experience: You and Del both know JD Lasica, Jeff Cable, and 36 others
Not too long ago spreadsheets were a viable solution for managing company data — even for major corporations.
The dynamic business environment we work in today creates data at a rate unfathomable just a few years ago.
And companies are struggling to keep pace with an accelerating rate of change.
As a result, companies needing to stay competitive in the market need to get better at innovation management, and need the tools to help establish this…
Case in point, spreadsheets fall way too short to be relied on for timely, actionable insights.
Ultimately, you need a channel data management system that has:
• A single and consistent view of your enterprise
Goodbye spreadsheets, you had a good run...
We get this question a lot: "What factors should I consider when deciding to go with Saas vs building on-premise?" It's a complex question, so hopefully this guide will help.

At Computer Market Research, we help businesses from all corners of the globeto better manage the relationship they share with channel partners via automated channel management solutions.Our state-of-the-art, cost-effective SaaS (software as a service) platform revolutionizes the way B2B marketing programs are operated as well as reduces channel conflict, builds transparency, streamlines incentive activities, increases productivity, and ultimately, enables your channel partners to effectively market and sell your products. Automated solutions we provide: Channel Operations - Channel POS, Channel Inventory, Ship and debit/Automated Distributor Claims Mgmt., CRM/ERP Integration Channel Sales - Deal Registration, Opportunity Management, SPIFF Management Channel Marketing - Co-op/MDF, Rebate Management,  Track Earned IncentivesChannel Partner Management - Partner onboarding, Reseller profile, Dealer Signup, Document Manager

MioDatos provides channel marketers with a robust solution for creating, scheduling and distributing marketing materials for customers. Utilizing the power of Synchronized Channel Marketing (SCM), MioDatos streamlines social media content, marketing emails and landing pages with seamless efficiency, giving you the tools to reach a broader scale audience without the aches and pains of trying to manually manage and share online marketing content with channel partners. Optimize consumer awareness, nurture leads, unify B2B objectives, establish consistent co-branded messaging, develop stronger marketing campaigns and increase partner loyalty with business partners through MioDatos’ revolutionary platform.

summary: Words like “hard-coded,” “manual,” and “can’t” have inspired me to find a solution that would eliminate these words from a business’s vocabulary. Our powerful #ChannelDataManagement (CDM) and #PartnerRelationshipManagement (PRM) solutions transform business relationships, revitalizing your indirect channel from a slow moving turtle into your most important asset for driving revenue.  Contact me if you or your company needs help in these areas:- Your team needs help automating channel incentives or Ship and Debit/special pricing programs- Your team fails to produce an adequate ROI on channel incentives po- Your company struggles to identify “revenue leakage” in the channel - Your channel partners are dissatisfied with their reimbursement turnaround time- Your channel partners continue to opt-out of incentives or discount opportunities - Your indirect sales pipeline has stayed stagnate for far too long- Your company has trouble penetrating new markets or closing big opportunities  - Your team struggles to identify GAAP violations (no detailed audit trail)- Your team struggles to manage disparate partner data feeds and/or solve disputes efficiently - Your team has trouble designing objective program guidelines or stacking opportunities Request a conversation/demo here – http://computermarketresearch.com/computer-market-research-demo-request/Email: dheles@computermarketresearch.com Phone: (858) 795-1021 Ext. 200https://www.computermarketresearch.com
